website_summaries.verdict: This organic formula uses a blend of 15 natural ingredients including oatmeal, witch hazel, chamomile, and echinacea for anti-viral, anti-inflammatory, and anti-bacterial action.
pros: A well-liked formula that works well on treating a wide range of skin ailments, and also works well on people
It has a mild, pleasant clove smell, and also does double duty as an insect repellent
Safe for dogs to ingest if licked
cons: You need to spray on quite a lot to see effectiveness
Some of the ingredients are known to not be safe for cats, so it must be kept away from kitties

customer_reviews.title: The Incredible Skin Spray works!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! My Australian Cattle Dog is allergic to all insect bites and my daughter, with her two cats, stayed at my house while we were gone for 6-wks. We came home to fleas, ACCK!! Richard's Organics Incredible Skin Spray worked better than dyphenhydramine, Bactine and vinegar rinses to soothe her itching. Two applications and she was itch free. THANK YOU!! And I didn't have to prepare my own solution with similar essential oils, as I thought I would gave to do.
customer_reviews.author: jody Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work how I was hoping it would
customer_reviews.text: We've been trying everything to determine why my dog compulsively itches his side {diet change, medicated shampoo, antihistamines, etc.}. This was one of the things we tried and it did not work for us. His problem has been determined to likely be neurological. I picked this particular item because of the ingredients {I can pronounce all of them} and if a dog is itching for other - resolvable - reasons or has skin problems, I think this product would work and prove helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Archer1

customer_reviews.title: Falsely displayed
customer_reviews.text: I only ordered this because of the pump. I bought it from the store previously, it was very difficult to use. The pump was like a bottle of hair spray, it would your finger out quickly. Try spraying a standard poodle down with a pocket size bottle, that's what it feels like. I saw this on Amazon and got excited because I like the actual product. Well I received the original pump, not thi spray. Amazon issued me a refund for my trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Miss D

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Richard's Organics Skin spray works great on my dog. Whenever she starts to scratch a lot, or bite her backside, I spray this on and it immediately soothes her skin. It also smells great. My dog likes to have this sprayed on her... she actually wags her tail when I'm doing it. In the past, when using other products, she would run away if she saw me picking up a spray bottle; not with Richard's Organics!
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!!! I have four shorty Jack Russels and they all have skin issue and allergies from moderate to serve...this is the ONLY product that I found in five years that gives them ALL relief, heals and stops the constate itchies that leads to hot spots, and loss of hair. It also does not irritate their sensitive skin as or dry it out.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Sturgill

customer_reviews.title: Natural spray
customer_reviews.text: My dog has allergies and the fur on her chest was getting thin and turning black. I have been using this spray for weeks and the fur is returning. It smells good, not messy , doesn't burn and she doesn't mind getting sprayed. Natural product.
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: Great on .skin, not the right spray top.
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a 5 star--I LOVE this product. I use it on my skin--it is wonderful. But it doesn't come with the spray top shown in the picture. it comes with a cheap push spray. The first one I bought had that spray top which comes on the bottle and opens and closes at the neck--great for traveling. Other than that--you will love this--I know, I know it says it is for dogs--but read the ingredients--the best organic you can get., you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Marshall

customer_reviews.title: A FAVORITE product for my four footed family !!
customer_reviews.text: It's all about the dogs!! They love this sootheing spray. I've tried for quite a while to prevent whatever is irritating their hip and tail areas. Solutions and drops from the vet didn't work but Richard's certainly helps and the pets are even eager when they see me with the blue Richard's spray! My one wish? Quart size with a pistol grip sprayer would make us ALL satisfied. The only drawback is pricing - quite steep for a social security budget.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much. A little pricey but quality ingredients are used. It has a nice smell without being overpowering for your dog’s sensitive nose. Another good use for this product: It’s helpful to use a washcloth with warm water, wring it out, then spray bottom of each paw pad after a walk and wipe off with the washcloth. Prevents dog from tracking in dirt. 🐾🐾👍
customer_reviews.author: CPP

customer_reviews.title: This was not for me but for my dog! ...
customer_reviews.text: This was not for me but for my dog! And it appears it works very well on her if I ever get itchy I'll try it myself. She has stopped biting and scratching at her feet and legs. It worked almost instantly. If your dog has dry itchy skin or skin allergies this is a definite must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mishler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: My dog was given to me from a friend who couldn't keep him anymore so he asked me if I could take him. When I got him he had a rash on his belly due to an allergic reaction to cheap dog food so I eliminated the cheap dog and got the right kind, and started spraying this stuff on him and within 24 hours this is the difference it made. This is an amazing product and I highly recommend it, I even sprayed it on myself and it soothed a minor cut on my finger.
customer_reviews.author: chanel

customer_reviews.title: Effective for dry irritated skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this spray twice a day on our German Shepherd who is changing coats and has extremely dry itchy skin and it really seems to provide some relief for her. She lets me apply it with no fight and she stops scratching or chewing for some time after. It would be better in a larger size as I can easily go through a bottle in 2-3 days so it gets expensive. But I think it is a great product that seems to help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My little teacup Schnauzer was having issues with flea bites. He has sensitive skin and was breaking out and his skin stayed inflamed. I finally found a flea med that worked to stop the flea bites and this product along with the spray helped my fur babie's skin heal up. He no longer scratches and has irritated skin like before. I will deff be a life long customer to this product. If you are desperate like I was to get relief for you fur baby this product is it.
customer_reviews.author: marla cornell

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is magic, I have a german shepherd ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is magic, I have a german shepherd with yeasty itchy skin, I use the shampoo for bathing and finish with Incredible Skin. It's made a big difference in his biting himself and healing his hotspots!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Loyall

customer_reviews.title: Be alert for negative reaction to your dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog, black Lab, had an allergic reaction to this medication after the second application to a hot spot. Small white pussy looking lumps popped up and obviously caused Casey some pain. I cleaned the area carefully and by morning the white lumps were gone but the hot spot was quite inflamed. A trip to the vet is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: California Royer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with the sprayer that was in the picture. I have arthritis and was very excited for it. I think I got the older version But my dog lover it so I keep getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra

customer_reviews.title: Skin Spray for Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd has a skin condition that gives him severe dandruff, when he wouldn't stop itching I ordered a bottle of this spray and used it on him daily by spraying it through his fur and rubbing it into his skin. within 2 days of doing this, his dandruff was almost completely gone as well as his itching. This product seriously works!
customer_reviews.author: Moretoys

customer_reviews.title: Company needs to check the spray nozzle
customer_reviews.text: This has a great scent, aromatic. My dogs are prone to rashes and this definitely soothes their skin. Only complaint last couple of bottles I ordered spray nozzle stopped working after a few sprays.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalez Family

customer_reviews.title: Picture does not represent what was sent
customer_reviews.text: The picture of the product does not represent what was sent. The pArt thAt dispenses the liquid was a sprayer that you push with your index finger and did not put out much of a spray. Eventually had to pour the liquid on to my hand to dispense. Pretty sad.....
customer_reviews.author: M. McPhee

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing on dry itchy dog. And makes him smell nice too.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my pugs skin specially under his belly and on his feet which he sometimes chews when they are dry and he likes it. He sits really well when I use it as if he knows it will feel good after, It has a strong clove and essential oil smell but I like it. Only thing I wish it had a better spray mechanism. The spritzer nozzle on it is kinda cheap and gets hard to spray at different angles. Also harder to use once it’s only a quarter full. Over all I like it this is the second bottle I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Spray 4 Healing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this I've used several products and spent hundreds of $ at the vet! This is the only spray that healed my dogs legs! She chews them raw from hot spots...now she's finally stopped and her legs are able to heal... Thank you for this wonderful spray 💙 Best Regards April
customer_reviews.author: Apelila L.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Cap not on tight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my dogs who all seem to be allergic to grass. After using this product one time, I can already see a difference in my dogs! The only complaint I have is the cap was not on all the way so a 1/4 of the product was leaked out all over the box & on the packaging of the other items in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Jones

customer_reviews.title: Non irritating
customer_reviews.text: This product is not irritating on my dogs' already sensitive skin. I'm also going to try giving her probiotics/prebiotics to see if this addition to her diet helps her eliminate scratching. The smell is nice and my dog just stands calmly for me to spray it on her.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Williams

customer_reviews.title: This is making a new gentleman out of my old boy!
customer_reviews.text: This product makes all of the itchiness on my old rescue dog go away! Places, where he has rubbed himself raw, are now healed! Great product! I would recommend it to anyone with a dog! My Gobby is a happy camper and so am I! What more could anyone ask for!
customer_reviews.author: PamW

customer_reviews.title: The rashes/hot spots disappear pretty quickly and my dog is always calm after using ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has made a difference for my dogs. My tibetan spaniel gets hot spots and he's allergic to flee bites. So whenever he has rashes or hot spots, I just use this and it makes a difference. The rashes/hot spots disappear pretty quickly and my dog is always calm after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Audriana

customer_reviews.title: Happy and Clean
customer_reviews.text: I have a urinary/ fecal incontinent dog. I use this to clean him up when I change him. I have tried waterless shampoos and fragrance sprays and micellar cleaners- this is the best product I've found to keep his skin happy and clean. I like the scent a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog with allergies and can't figure out to what which is very frustraing for me and my dog. This is a great product line. I use the tick spray by the same company and it works great. Do not like using chemicals/pesticides on my pets.
customer_reviews.author: kata

customer_reviews.title: Nice and gentle...
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Good scent, and seems to he a gentle and more natural remedy for inflammation on my little dog's paws.

customer_reviews.title: Great product soothing relief
customer_reviews.text: My dog itches and chews and scratches but he loves when I put this on and rub it into his undercoat . He actually get excited when he sees me bring it out.

customer_reviews.text: My pup has allergies, that may be the reason this product didn't provide TOTAL relief. It did however provide some.

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and it smells amazing. It’s a bit strong for the pups for a few seconds. I do t know how long lasting it is; I spray my hands a few times and rub it on them each morning and me too!
customer_reviews.author: L. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Best doggie skincare!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent thousands on prescription drugs, treatments, baths, grooming aids over tbe years. This product is the best of all. My Sheltie lives for a bath and spray! He goes to the tub and barks until I turn on the water!

customer_reviews.title: For a non-medicated option it was good
customer_reviews.text: It was not a magical solution, but the smell surprisingly did not bother my dog. It did seem to have some soothing effect, but did not seem to correct his skin issue.

customer_reviews.title: Working daily
customer_reviews.text: Best for our dog that has excessive dry skin during winter. Smell is okay and dog seems to be good with it also.

customer_reviews.title: This works good for my Chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: This works good for my Chihuahua. Chihuahuas have dry skin, so they get itchy a lot. It really helps her. I've noticed a lot less itching. Great product. Although, this product isn't as pictured...it doesn't come with that top.

customer_reviews.title: Working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in place of my usual Jeffers Itch Halt that is far superior and only $5 but does not have free shipping. This smell is nice but not unbelievable like Jeffers Itch Halt. This is a pleasant smell and it seems to work as my dog sleeps after it's applied.

customer_reviews.title: works Great was so surprised

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Wrong spray top.

The trigger sprayer would be much better & I am very disappointed in the difference from what I expected to receive.

It also has a nice scent, and makes my dog smell nice for days :-)

customer_reviews.title: This is a 5 star product with a "no star ...

The ingredients really work on my dog-virtually NO MORE ITCHING after just 2 weeks! WOW However, the darn sprayer, gives me reason to buy a similar product without this problem.

customer_reviews.text: My dog has severe allergies and I have tried everything to ease his skin irritation. I sprayed him on his back, stomach, and rear end and it smelled great, but it was a little too watery. I would have preferred it to be a bit thicker to soothe his skin better. It would work only temporarily until the spray dried. You probably need to spray it on your pet throughout the day for it to be totally effective.

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Easy to use. No mess and dogs do not mind it. Very effective for minor itching.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff inside, but horrible spray bottle
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. My 12 y/o Westie has allergies to freshly bloomed grass and licks his paws into oblivion when he does. We've gone through probably 10 different similar products and this one is the best - from its effect to smell, it's got a lot of things going. However, the spray bottle it comes in is absolutely terrible. It wasn't the jointed cap pictured, it was a normal spray type (and didn't have the extra sealing piece) that is so hard to press that when we finally corner the pup, we struggle to get the product out onto his paws.

customer_reviews.title: Very strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I used this once and the smell was so strong I had to bathe my dog to get it off of him.

customer_reviews.text: I have tried both American and UK products in the desperate attempt to bring relief to my 3 dog-girls while living in Missouri temporarily. The bugs here are horrific and the humidity devastating to them. This WORKS! My girls do not fight me to apply and are comfortable in their bodies with it. This has brought peace of mind to me as well as them. No side effects have been experienced, I have cattle dogs (a red-heeler, a border collie, and a reg. malamute) if breed specific needs be addressed. I highly recommend this product.

However, after using it multiple times on my Yorkie I wasn't impressed. It did very little to reduce the redness to her skin and it seemed like she scratched at the area even more after applying it. Perhaps just as bad, It smelled awful. Obviously this works for a lot of dog owners but I will never buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing! Gives my boy almost instant relief from his ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Gives my boy almost instant relief from his terrible skin allergies & helps to heal his hot spots so quickly! The smell is awesome as well!
customer_reviews.author: Scott + Jami Dudek

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Seems to work well for grass allergies on ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems to work well for grass allergies on my dog's feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Haven't seen much of a difference
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed a difference with my dogs itching. It smells good and is easy enough to spray on although it would be nice if the spray spout could be longer.
customer_reviews.author: LouLou

customer_reviews.title: Came in on time. Can't tell much difference from ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in on time. Can't tell much difference from any off the shelf skin spray.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Massengill

customer_reviews.title: Works on Eczema
customer_reviews.text: We actually use this for skin afflicted with eczema, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff only thing I use for my dogs
customer_reviews.author: odessa mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Richards Organics Incredible Skin Spray for Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my dog on her incision after surgery. It worked really well and also seemed to keep her from licking the incision site. I will use it again. Her hair is growing back nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Worked for what I needed. My dogs skin did get better but also changed her diet . Dogs must eat meat not corn , I found out lol
customer_reviews.author: Howard Scott Benson

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product, but it did not arrive as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, but it did not arrive as pictured. Shows having a trigger nozzle spray(which i have had before), now comes wirh a cheap push spray top that doesnt work. Not pleased
customer_reviews.author: jim.partlow

product_meta.title: RICHARD'S ORGANICS Incredible Skin Spray for Dogs (12 fl oz)
product_meta.description: SynergyLabs Richard's Organics Incredible Skin Spray for Dogs; 12 fl. oz. INGREDIENTS - Purified Water, Witch Hazel, Glycerin, Tea Tree Oil, DMDM Hydantoin, Natural Colloidal Oatmeal, Neem Oil, Chamomile Oil, Cranesbill Extract, Pennyroyal Extract, Calendula Extract, Yarrow Extract, Echinacea Extract, Clove Oil, Sage Oil, Lemon Grass Oil, Aloe Vera.
feature_bullets: HEAL AND SOOTHE – Richard’s Organics Incredible Skin Spray for Dogs soothes irritations and speeds healing of a wide variety of skin problems in dogs including hot spots, insect bites, rashes, ringworm, inflammations, eczema, sunburn, minor wounds and dry skin.

FAST ACTING – Healing skin spray starts working immediately and does not take long to notice a difference in your dog’s skin. The 100% natural, paraben-free spray quickly provides anti-viral, anti-bacterial and anti-inflammatory action to irritations and reduces small wound discharge and bleeding.

VETERINARIAN RECOMMENDED – Richard’s Organics topical skin spray is safe and effective using a unique blend of 15 plant extracts to soothe and speed healing of skin irritations including clove oil, echinacea, colloidal oatmeal, tea tree oil, aloe vera gel, chamomile, sage oil, witch hazel and more.

FOR USE ON DOGS (AND PET PARENTS) – Incredible skin spray is for topical use on dogs and puppies over 12 weeks of age. Great for pets with sensitive skin, the spray has a pleasant smell and won’t further irritate or dry out the skin. Safe for frequent use, it will not remove spot-on flea and tick treatments. Not safe for cats.

PREMIUM PRODUCTS FOR PREMIUM PETS – SynergyLab’s Richard’s Organics pet wellness and healing products are created with premium ingredients and available at a price that pet parents can afford. We know your dogs are more than just pets, because we are pet parents too.
